data.title: I'm With the Band - Golden Isles Live Music
data.meta_description: I'm With the Band provides you with the most comprehensive, up-to-date LIVE music listings for the Golden Isles and beyond. Check it before you go out and share it with your friends. Find us on Facebook & Instagram too at @imwiththebandssi.
data.text:
GOLDEN ISLES WEEKLY LIVE MUSIC LISTINGS THRU 8/25

New week…let’s goooo!

For more information about the venues or the musicians listed herein, go to the related links section on this page to access a guide with info about our local performers and frequent visitors & their musical genres and an index of local venues that host live music regularly.

MONDAY 8/19

GEORGIA SEA GRILL (SSI) - Tim Akins on piano 6:15-9:15pm

GNAT’S LANDING (SSI) - Bachman’s Birthday Bash with Island Garage Band 6-9pm

PALM COAST COFFEE (SSI) - Open Mic Night hosted by Anthony Stubelek - $5 cover for non-performers - sign-up 8pm, music 8:3pm-midnight

TORTUGA JACK’S (JI) - Josh Kirkland 5-8pm

WEE PUB BEACH (JI) - Scott Pallot 7-10pm

WOODBINE OPRY - Satilla Blue 7pm (Dining room opens at 5pm)

SUNDAYS:

TOUCANS ALE HOUSE PATIO (Bwk) - Family Karaoke with DLuv & Lacie 6-9pm

I'm With the Band listings are compiled using information provided by the bands and venues listed herein, and curated from the public information they post. Information is subject to change -- especially when South Georgia weather is involved. My apologies for any inaccuracies or omissions. This weekly listing is provided free of charge as a public service and means to promote local live music. Please support your local bands and the venues that make the music possible. If you re-print, copy, or otherwise share the information compiled here via print, Internet, social media, or other format, without directly sharing this link, please credit “I’m With the Band” as your source. You can also find us on Facebook, Instagram, and Threads (@imwiththebandssi). Any daily posts from those accounts shared by other sources may contain inaccuracies as changes may occur after the original post. We always recommend checking the weekly blog online for the most up-to-date info with changes & weather cancellations. To support this little live music blog or show some love for the local music scene, you can purchase “I’m With the Band” long & short- sleeved tees and trucker hats in a variety of colors from the Elegant Island Living online store at https://elegant-island-living.myshopify.com. Feel free to contact me directly with information or questions at kathionssi@gmail.com.
